text: f'in lm ystjb hwla' almushrikun lakum -ayha alrasul wman aman mek- lamaa tdewnhm 'ilyh; lieajz aljamie ean dhlk, faelamuu 'ana hdha alquran 'iinama 'anzalah allah ealaa rasulih bieilmih walays min qawl albshr, waelamuu 'ana la 'ilh yuebd bihaqi 'iilaa allh, fahal 'antum -bed qiam hadhih alhujat elykm- muslimun mnqadwn lilah wrswlh?
